item.title: About
item.description: I am Gyanesh Gupta, a graduate from Indian Institute of Technology, Kanpur and majoring in Computer Science and Engineering. I am currently working at Oracle Bengaluru as a Member of Technical Staff. My interests revolve around Learning in General and Deep Learning/NLP specifically and have couple of projects to my belt. I am actively looking for Research Assistant/Junior Researcher positions in ML/NLP for around a year. Apart from projects, I am regular at reading papers.
